comment: Last night the President engaged in what is widely being recognized as an act of war against Iran , one that now risks the lives of millions of innocent people . Now is the moment to prevent war & protect innocent people - the question for many is how , publicly & Congressionally

comment: :No wants a war . Iran had to be checked with an incredible show of force . The President is an isolationist , he doesn't want a war . Deterrence through overwhelming force will hopefully prevent one .
